name: Font of Might
description: Picking up elemental wells grants bonus damage to weapons matching your subclass element.

name: Elemental Time Dilation
description: Extends the duration of beneficial effects from elemental wells.

name: Well of Life
description: Picking up a Void elemental well grants health regeneration.

name: Recharge Wellmaker
description: Dealing damage with charged melee abilities creates elemental wells.

name: Melee Wellmaker
description: Rapid melee defeats create elemental wells.

name: Hands-On
description: Melee kills grant bonus Super energy.

name: Ashes to Assets
description: Grenade kills grant bonus Super energy.

name: Recuperation
description: Picking up Orbs of Power grants health.

name: Ammo Finder
description: Increases the chance to find ammo for your weapons.
